Package com.distrimind.bouncycastle.pqc.crypto.rainbow.util

Class RainbowUtil

java.lang.Object
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.pqc.crypto.rainbow.util.RainbowUtil
public class RainbowUtil
extends java.lang.Object
This class is needed for the conversions while encoding and decoding, as well as for comparison between arrays of some dimensions
